title: [Large-Scale] Online Language Microlearning Course Utilizing Collaborative Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Proficiency in Digital Learning Tools
context.additional_context: Learner role: students/job seekers, domain expertise: beginner, assessment method: formative assessment-centered, technological environment: digital devices provided

learning_goals: Within six months, learners achieve 70% or higher proficiency in beginner-level language communication skills (reading/listening) through 15-minute microlearning modules, three times weekly, in a mobile environment.
Learners exchange peer feedback on language assignments once weekly with 80% or higher participation through collaborative learning activities.
Learners achieve 85% or higher monthly learning outcomes through formative assessments (quizzes, discussion participation).

resources: Collaborative tool with voice chat functionality

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
